backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko actor data types for training sessions, belt progress, user profiles, techniques, goals, and system status.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence reports detailing required UI changes and associated frontend files for two features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of key frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app into the root div and imports main.tsx.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_105.md: Documentation for clean rebuild and redeploy of Draft 105 with no code changes.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_110.md: Instructions for performing a clean rebuild and redeploy of Draft 110 without modifying application code.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_115.md: Records clean rebuild and redeploy steps for Draft 115 with no functional or UI changes.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_125.md: Describes clean rebuild and redeploy process for Draft 125 with unchanged codebase.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_94.md: Rebuild and redeploy checklist for Draft 94 ensuring no functional or UI changes.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_105.md: Template-based redeploy note for Draft 105 covering steps, status, and canister info.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_110.md: Redeploy summary template for Draft 110 including steps, status, and error sections.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_115.md: Template redeploy note for Draft 115 capturing metadata, steps, and errors.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_125.md: Redeploy documentation for Draft 125 with fields for steps, outputs, and results.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_TEMPLATE.md: Generic redeploy note template for documenting deployment targets and failures.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_105.md: Smoke‑test checklist for verifying Draft 105 after deployment.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_110.md: Smoke‑check guide for Draft 110 validating initial load and core behavior.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_115.md: Smoke‑test checklist for Draft 115 covering load and login verification.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_125.md: Smoke‑test checklist for Draft 125 confirming basic post‑deployment functionality.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication, backend actor readiness, profile loading, theming, and routing between login, profile setup, and dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AddTechniqueDial: Modal form for adding a technique with fields, category selection, tags, and auto-generated YouTube thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/AddTrainingDialo: Modal for adding or editing training sessions, handling date navigation, duration, theme, mood, intensity, and saving records.
frontend/src/components/Analytics.tsx: Empty component placeholder for analytics functionality.
frontend/src/components/BeltTracker.tsx: Displays and updates belt progress, computing gamified stats from training and submission logs with belt image handling.
frontend/src/components/CachedImage.tsx: Image component that preloads and caches images with fallback and loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/DebugOverlay.tsx: Empty component placeholder for debug overlay functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution with a link and decorative heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header that shows branding, profile access, theme toggle, and logout, handling identity and theme state updates.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Full‑screen login UI using Internet Identity with loading state and introductory feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/Profile.tsx: Empty placeholder component; no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/ProfileAnalytics: Displays user analytics including sessions, streaks, submissions, belt data, and cached images after loading profile and training logs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation/edit form handling username, belt, gym info, dates, and profile picture upload with backend save flows.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionLogSec: Manages submission log editing by belt level with merge, add/remove, unsaved‑changes detection, and backend save.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionSelect: Searchable popover to add a submission from preset options, filtering out already‑selected items and supporting keyboard navigation.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionTagInp: Empty placeholder component; no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/TechniqueLibrary: Displays a filterable, searchable list of techniques with category tabs and an add-technique dialog.
Renders a yearly heat map of training hours with local-time date mapping and dynamic theme updates.
frontend/src/components/TrainingHoursHea: Provides an editable yearly heat map for training hours using ISO weekday grid logic and CRUD hooks.
frontend/src/components/TrainingLog.tsx: Shows training session analytics, charts, and logs with add/edit support.
frontend/src/components/TrainingMonthCal: Displays a monthly calendar of sessions with per-day styling and editing hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWrapper.ts: Initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with detailed step-by-step logging and exposes readiness state. Tracks authentication, identity retrieval, actor creation, and admin-token bootstrapping.
frontend/src/hooks/useDragToScroll.ts: Provides a ref enabling drag-to-scroll behavior for any scrollable element using pointer events. Manages drag state and updates scroll positions accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login/logout, and login status. Restores stored identities and manages login flow state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, registration, and training-related data through the actor wrapper. Ensures actor readiness and handles errors with notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode palettes, BJJ-specific colors, scrollbar styles, and heat-map utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/beltStatsCalculator.ts: Calculates gamified belt progression stats based on training sessions and submission logs, including progression, experience, submissions, and technique mastery percentages.
frontend/src/lib/beltUtils.ts: Utility functions for belt image URL generation, friendly name formatting, and preloading belt images for all belt levels and stripe counts.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Maps session theme enums to human-readable labels with a fallback.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: Provides an in-memory image preloading cache to avoid flashing and a function to clear it.
frontend/src/lib/intensityUtils.ts: Defines intensity options and utilities for labels, colors, short codes, and numeric conversions.
frontend/src/lib/moodIcons.ts: Maps mood ratings to icon assets and labels, with helpers for getting single or all mood icons.
frontend/src/lib/submissionLogUtils.ts: Utility functions for managing submission logs including normalization, lookup, add/remove, count changes, and duplicate merging.
frontend/src/lib/submissionOptions.ts: Exports a comprehensive alphabetized list of BJJ submission technique names.
frontend/src/lib/submissionsListLoader.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/trainingAnalytics.ts: Provides analytics helpers for sessions including favorite themes, average intensity, unique submissions, time bucketing, and roll averages.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Includes class merging, date formatting/parsing, weekday utilities, heatmap color logic, and year grid generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, query client, identity provider, and renders the main app.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders tabbed dashboard UI with sections for analytics, training log, belt tracking, and technique library.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and optionally remove sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, color tokens, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s structured state, including versioning, a high-level dapp summary, and a list of existing feature definitions with metadata.
